name: Azusa RP Online
description: Azusa Online is an open world roleplay driven game, focused in developing the world and story of your character while interacting with other players. Compete in tournaments around the world to earn rights to wear the legendary Olympian armors and help defy gods; Athena, Hades, Zeus and Poseidon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 600 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet Explorer 8 or higher required to render the Azusa Launcher
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection
